# Function string

Create a string or convert any object into a string. Elements of Arrays and Matrices are processed element wise


### Parameters

Parameter | Type | Description
--------- | ---- | -----------
`value` | * &#124; Array &#124; Matrix | 

### Returns

Type | Description
---- | -----------
String &#124; Array &#124; Matrix | str
